## Adrià Mitjavila Ventura {#title}

### MSc | Bioinformatician at *Institut Josep Carreras*

<p style="font-size:13px">Biotechnologist with training in Molecular Genetics and Bioinformatics. Interested in omics data analysis to study the mechanisms of gene regulation in mammals. See more about me on [my website](https://amitjavilaventura.github.io).</p>

### Bioinformatician & Master's thesis student

*[Institut Josep Carreras](https://www.carrerasresearch.org/)*

Badalona, Spain

08/2021 - 11/2022

[**Group of Regulatory Genomics (Dr. Tanya Vavouri)**](https://www.carrerasresearch.org/en/regulatory-genomics/)<br>
Study of Piwi-interacting RNAs (piRNAs), their biogenesis mechanisms and their conservation across species.

- Development and application of a pipeline to process small RNA-seq data, focused on the study of piRNAs.
- Development of a method for differential expression without gene length differences when using multiple species.
- Mentoring of bachelor's and master's thesis students. 
- Master's thesis (UOC): *Analysis of the variation in piRNA expression across three <u>Mus</u> species*. Grade: 9.78/10 (**with honours**). Supervisor: Dr. Tanya Vavouri.


### Bioinformatician

*[Istituto Europeo di Oncologia](https://www.research.ieo.it/)*

Milan, Italy

07/2019 - 07/2021

[**Group of Epigenetic Mechanisms in Cancer (Dr. Diego Pasini)**](https://www.research.ieo.it/research-and-technology/principal-investigators/epigenetic-mechanisms-in-cancer/)<br>
Study of Wnt/$\beta$catenin signaling pathway -and others- and its effects in transcription and epigenetic modifications in the context of colorectal cancer and stem cell development.

- Analysis and integration of omics data (RNA-/ChIP-/ATAC-seq).
- Comparison of different ATAC-seq peak callers.
- Development of a pipeline to process and analyze ATAC-seq data.
- Comparison of different sequencing depths for RNA-seq and their influence in differential expression analysis.

### Master's thesis student & Research assistant

*[Instituto de Biomedicina de Sevilla](ibis-sevilla.es)*

Seville, Spain

09/2017 - 10/2018

[**Group of Gene Expression (Dr. Sebastián Chávez)**](https://www.ibis-sevilla.es/investigacion/oncohematologia-y-genetica/expresion-genica/chavez-de-diego-sebastian.aspx) <br> 
Study of Xrn1 and Ccr4 roles in yeast nucleosome architecture and gene transcription.

- Analysis of MNase-seq data from Xrn1-, Ccr4-mutant and WT yeast strains.
- Perform MNase-qPCR experiments, including MNase DNA digestion, primer desing, qPCRs and analysis.
<br>
- Master's thesis (US): *Influence of Xrn1 in nucleosome positioning [...] and its effects in transcription*. Grade: 9.2/10. Supervisors: Dr. Sebastián Chávez de Diego and Dr. Gabriel Gutiérrez Pozo.

*[Institut d'Investigació Biomèdica de Girona](https://idibgi.org/)*

Girona, Spain

[**Unit of Diabetes, Endocrinology and Nutrition**](https://idibgi.org/grups/nes-nutricio-eumetabolisme-i-salut/) <br>
